Safe HaskellSafe
LanguageHaskell2010

KMP

Description

Implementation of Knuth–Morris–Pratt algorithm. It finds pattern in data in O(n) time.

Synopsis

  • findPattern :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> [Int]

Documentation

findPattern #

Arguments

:: Eq a 
=> [a]

First argument: pattern

-> [a]

Second argument: data where to find pattern

-> [Int]

Resault: List of indexes where pattern starts in data

Function find every occurrence of pattern in the data using KMP alghoritm.
